measure.CatchLine: Prohibits lender in reverse mortgage transaction from enforcing requirement to sell or transfer residential real property that secures reverse mortgage loan upon death of borrower for 12-month period following expiration of emergency period if relatives of deceased borrower occupy residential real property.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Prohibits lender in reverse mortgage transaction from enforcing requirement to sell or transfer residential real property that secures reverse mortgage loan upon death of borrower for 12-month period following expiration of emergency period if relatives of deceased borrower occupy residential real property. 
	Sunsets one year following expiration of emergency period. 
	Declares emergency, effective on passage.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to reverse mortgage loan agreements; and declaring an emergency.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to reverse mortgage loan agreements; declaring an emergency.
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
